adverbs.description: indissolubly (comparative more indissolubly, superlative most indissolubly)

entries.meaning: In an indissoluble manner; in a manner that is unable to be dissolved.
examples: Wedlok is the laufull couple of man & wife, ordeyned indissolubly to bring forth children, & to eschew fornicacion.  […]  I added this terme (indissolubly) that is to saye, vndepartably or wtout breakyng, that a man shold not thinke that wedlocke ones lawfullye made can be vndone & broken  […]
